text:
As a proud parent, I'm delighted to share my exceptional experience with DPS International School Singapore. The school has successfully struck a balance between affordability and quality education, making it an excellent value proposition.

The institution's commitment to modern teaching methods is evident in its incorporation of cutting-edge technology and innovative teaching aids. This has significantly enhanced my child's learning experience.

Beyond academics, the school offers a diverse range of Extra-Curricular Activities (ECAs), catering to various interests and talents. This has helped my child develop important life skills, such as teamwork, leadership, and time management.

I'm particularly impressed with the school's 'no gadget policy' for students. In today's digital age, this is a refreshing and responsible approach that promotes healthy habits and minimizes distractions.

Lastly, the teachers at DPS International School Singapore are not only well-trained and qualified but also passionate about their work. Their dedication to nurturing young minds is evident in the supportive and inclusive learning environment they create.

Overall, I'm grateful to have found a school that shares my values and priorities. I highly recommend DPS International School Singapore to parents seeking a holistic education for their children."
Newly opened. Very well renovated and DPS is famous for overall development of its students. Having all the facilities.

Equipped with modern classrooms, and smart boards, new DPSIS branch @ Alexandra provides a technology-driven education experience. The campus features well-equipped dedicated creative spaces for academics, arts, music and various other activities.  With a student-friendly design, the campus ensures a safe and inspiring atmosphere for holistic development of all young learners.  This expansion signifies DPSIS dedication to academic excellence, student well-being, and technological advancement.

With modern facilities, dedicated faculty, and a student-centric approach, DPS provides a nurturing environment for holistic learning. The school continues to instill strong values, leadership skills, and academic brilliance in every student. This expansion marks a new milestone in shaping future-ready, compassionate individuals!

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

As a parent,  I am excited about the opening of the new branch of DPS International School! The modern approach to education and excellent academic standards truly set it apart. The state-of-the-art facilities and dedicated faculty create an inspiring learning environment. Highly recommend it for anyone seeking quality education!
